sentences.en: Adam won't allow anyone to chisel in on his profits.
sentences.cn: 亚当不允许任何人染指他的利益.

sentences.en: Armed with only a chisel, a chainsaw and a hammer, the 32-year-old moved his family to a hillside in Wales and started digging.
sentences.cn: 仅用凿子，电锯和锤子这些工具，这位32岁的男子举家搬到了位于威尔士的一个山坡，并开始继续挖凿（房子）。

sentences.en: He chipped away at a block of marble with a chisel.
sentences.cn: 他连续用凿子凿一块大理石.

sentences.en: He is chipping away at a block marble with a chisel.
sentences.cn: 他正在用凿子在大理石上不停地凿.

sentences.en: He set out to chisel a dog out of sandstone.
sentences.cn: 他开始用凿子将砂岩雕刻成一只狗。

sentences.en: He used a hammer and chisel to chip away at the wall.
He won't allow anyone to chisel in on his profits.
sentences.cn: 他不允许任何人染指他的利润.

sentences.en: He works with a file, a chisel, and an awl.
sentences.cn: 他工作起来又用锉刀, 又用凿子, 又用锥子.

sentences.en: How did that girl chisel you out of $ 500?
sentences.cn: 那女孩是如何骗得你500美元的?

sentences.en: She used a chisel to prise off the lid.
sentences.cn: 她用錾子来把盖子凿开.

sentences.en: Take it to this stage with the knife or chisel blade.
sentences.cn: 使用小刀或凿刀刀片将先角上的皮头剃成这个样子.

sentences.en: The firm found a way to chisel out of my overtime pay.
sentences.cn: 公司设法骗我的加班费.

sentences.en: They sit and chisel the stone to size.
sentences.cn: 他们坐下来把石头凿成合适的大小。

sentences.en: This chisel is useful for getting into awkward spaces.
sentences.cn: 这凿子在要伸入到犄角儿里时十分有用.

sentences.en: This tool is termed a chisel.
This will answer for a chisel.
To shape or form ( stone ) roughly with a broad chisel.
sentences.cn: 粗雕用一宽凿子粗糙的塑造或雕刻 ( 石头 )

words.tran_cn: 镌刻；用凿子刻（chisel的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: a metal tool with a sharp edge, used to cut wood or stone
a metal tool with a sharp edge, used to cut wood or stone
to use a chisel to cut wood or stone into a particular shape
